column2: Jesus turned water into wine at a wedding in Cana
Moses built the Ark to survive the flood
The Bible has 66 books in total
Paul was one of the original twelve disciples
King David killed Goliath with a sling and a stone
The Book of Revelation is the first book of the New Testament
The Ten Commandments were given to Moses on Mount Sinai
Jesus was baptized by John the Apostle
The Bible was originally written in English
Noah took two of every kind of animal onto the Ark
Jesus was born in the city of Nazareth
The Book of Job is considered one of the oldest books in the Bible
John the Baptist was a cousin of Jesus
